alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SOMERSET COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Fair Port, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deal Island around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Manokin, Upper Fairmount, Oriole, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Smith Island, Monie, Kingston, Crocheron, and Dames Quarter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Maryland.
